DOC.brief_summary: This study (GS-US-312-0117) is a multicenter, 2-arm, double-blind, parallel-group extension study that is a companion study to Study GS-US-312-0116, to evaluate the effect of idelalisib on the onset, magnitude, and duration of tumor control.
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study of Idelalisib for Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Who Participated in GS-US-312-0116
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Subjects in the primary Phase 3 study (Study GSUS3120116) who are compliant Tolerating primary study therapy
